001package gbw.melange.common.shading.constants;
002
003
004import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL30;
005
006/**
007 * <p>GLDrawStyle class.</p>
008 *
009 * @author GustavBW
010 * @version $Id: $Id
011 */
012public enum GLDrawStyle {
013    INVALID(-1),
014    TRIANGLES(GL30.GL_TRIANGLES),
015    TRIANGLE_STRIP(GL30.GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP),
016    TRIANGLE_FAN(GL30.GL_TRIANGLE_FAN),
017    LINES(GL30.GL_LINES),
018    LINE_STRIP(GL30.GL_LINE_STRIP),
019    LINE_LOOP(GL30.GL_LINE_LOOP),
020    POINTS(GL30.GL_POINTS);
021
022    public final int glValue;
023
024    GLDrawStyle(int gl30value) {
025        this.glValue = gl30value;
026    }
027
028    /**
029     * Get the equivalent GLDrawStyle from the GL30 integer constant
030     */
031    public static GLDrawStyle fromGL30(int gl30Value) {
032        for (GLDrawStyle style : values()) {
033            if (style.glValue == gl30Value) {
034                return style;
035            }
036        }
037        return INVALID;
038    }
039}
